p: The inclusion of condensed tannin extract in the young bullsâ€™ diets did not influence ( P > 0.05) the final pH and the Warner-Bratzler shear force of the salted and sun-dried meat. There was no effect ( P > 0.05) of the inclusion of condensed tannins on the color indices (L*, a*, b*, and C*). The oxidation of meat lipids for the 3 time periods (0, 25 and 50 days) had no effect ( P > 0.05).
